thread.title: Florida’s Medical Marijuana Legalization Amendment Has John Morgan Leading The Legal Weed Fight
thread.title_full: Florida’s Medical Marijuana Legalization Amendment Has John Morgan Leading The Legal Weed Fight - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Florida’s Medical Marijuana Legalization Amendment Has John Morgan Leading The Legal Weed Fight
text: In Florida, medical marijuana legalization efforts have led to the Supreme Court in Florida, announcing that they will be holding a hearing in December for a legal weed amendment. John Morgan, of the firm Morgan & Morgan and chairman for United for Care, announced that he will be matching all donations made to the cause....
